law.text: If, in the referendum called under the provisions of KRS 247.850 to 247.865, a majority of the eligible handlers in the area in which the referendum is conducted, who vote therein, shall vote in the affirmative and in favor of levying and collecting the assessment proposed in the referendum, then such assessment shall be collected in the manner determined and announced by the association conducting the referendum.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1980.
